channel.title: las files on Andy McDonald
channel.description: Recent content in las files on Andy McDonald

item.title: Exploring Well Log Data Using the Welly Python Library
item.description: A look into a Python library dedicated to loading, exploring and plotting well log LAS files.

item.title: Loading Multiple Well Log LAS Files Using Python
item.description: Log ASCII Standard (LAS) files are a common Oil & Gas industry format for storing and transferring well log data. Often we have many files. See how to load multiple files using Python.
